alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Coffee County through 430 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Glenwood to Elba. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elba, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Lee, Mixons Crossroads, Carl Folsom A/p, Lowry Mill, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Clowers Crossroads, Arcus, Woodland Grove Church, Jack, Java, Chestnut Grove, Richburg, Victoria, Frisco and Eanon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
